original: 沛國譙縣人，曹魏末代皇帝魏元帝。曹髦被弒後，司馬昭立曹奐為帝，在位五年，司馬炎篡位代魏，建晉朝。
text: Peiguo Qiaoxian, the last emperor of the Cao Wei Dynasty, Wei Yuandi. After Cao Mao was killed, Sima Zhaoli Cao Huan became emperor, and he reigned for five years. Sima Yan usurped the throne to replace the Wei and establish the Jin Dynasty.
